name: 陳潔晞
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
2/24   Introduction
3/3    The Transformation of Verbs
3/10   Phrases and Sentences
3/17   Counterfactual Sentences
3/24   Parallel Structures
3/31   Readings
4/7    Practices
4/14   Midterm Exam
4/21   Midterm Exam
4/28   Reading: Letters
5/5    Reading: Letters
5/12   Reading: The Structure of a Paragraph
5/19   Reading: Documents
5/26   Reading: Dialogue
6/2    Practice
6/9    Conclusion; Final Exam
6/16   Holiday
6/23   Final Exam
